title: Duwii for Senator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Reveal as Senator Duwii during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you are revealed, all Town member votes are secretly counted as 2.
- While you are revealed, if the leader of the evil faction is alive, their vote secretly counts as 0 as you are in power.
- After you have been revealed for 2 days, if any evil factional member still exists, you will be assassinated at the end of the day by the monarchy.
- While not revealed, you have a single use basic autovest.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

desc:
Post 4924
*"vote duwiiton for senator!!!*
*i am announcing my campaign"*
- Duwii 2024
